item.description:

public int WildyLevel = 0; public int leftwild = 0; public boolean InWildrange = false; public void WriteWildyLevel() { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@red@Danger!", 199); }
